channel.title: CVE Feed for Themeum -- Tutor LMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Themeum -- Tutor LMS

item.title: CVE-2024-43282|2024-08-19T14:28:14.533Z -- themeum -- tutor%20lms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Themeum Tutor LMS.This issue affects Tutor LMS: from n/a through 2.7.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-43231|2024-08-13T17:33:26.136Z -- themeum -- tutor%20lms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Themeum Tutor LMS allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Tutor LMS: from n/a through 2.7.3.
